document.full_text: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said the country's economy will likely shrink in the first half of 2011 due mainly to stalled output in the wake of japan's march 11 earthquake and tsunami, the wall street journal reported on saturday.
document.title: boj shirakawa sees japan economy contraction in jan-june
lines_and_colors: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said the country's economy will likely shrink in the first half of 2011 due mainly to stalled output in the wake of japan's march 11 earthquake and tsunami, the wall street journal reported on saturday.
